attributes.action: reduce the use of lorrys on  the roads from 7.00am till 7.00pm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: no lorrys on the road from this time,will mean less people killed on our roads 100s killed by lorrys each year.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
